Uses of Class
com.microsoft.azure.storage.blob.CloudBlobClient

  • Packages that use CloudBlobClient 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.storage
    This package contains the storage service base classes.
    com.microsoft.azure.storage.blob
    This package contains the storage service blob classes.

    • Uses of CloudBlobClient in com.microsoft.azure.storage

      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.storage that return CloudBlobClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloudBlobClient CloudStorageAccount.createCloudBlobClient()
      Creates a new Blob service client.

    • Uses of CloudBlobClient in com.microsoft.azure.storage.blob

      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.storage.blob that return CloudBlobClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloudBlobClient CloudBlobDirectory.getServiceClient()
      Returns the Blob service client associated with this directory.
      CloudBlobClient CloudBlobContainer.getServiceClient()
      Returns the Blob service client associated with this container.
      CloudBlobClient CloudBlob.getServiceClient()
      Returns the Blob service client associated with the blob.

      Constructor and Description
